dcterms:creator: L. S. Shapley
dcterms:description: A foundational dataset for two-player zero-sum Markov games, providing the theoretical framework for analyzing strategies in competitive environments.
dcterms:title: Two-player zero-sum Markov games

dcterms:creator: M. L. Littman
dcterms:description: A dataset that introduces the minimax Q-learning algorithm, specifically designed for two-player zero-sum Markov games, focusing on the learning dynamics in competitive settings.
dcterms:title: Minimax Q-learning

dcterms:creator: R. B. Diddigi
C. Kamanchi
S. Bhatnagar
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a generalized minimax Q-learning algorithm tailored for two-player zero-sum stochastic games, enhancing the learning framework for competitive scenarios.
dcterms:title: Generalized minimax Q-learning algorithm

dcterms:creator: M. L. Littman
C. Szepesvári
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores Nash Q-learning, a variant of Q-learning that incorporates Nash equilibrium concepts for general-sum games, providing insights into multi-agent learning dynamics.
dcterms:title: Nash Q-learning

dcterms:creator: M. L. Littman
dcterms:description: A dataset that introduces friend-or-foe Q-learning, a learning algorithm designed for general-sum games, focusing on the dynamics of cooperation and competition among agents.
dcterms:title: Friend-or-foe Q-learning

dcterms:creator: S. Srinivasan
M. Lanctot
V. Zambaldi
J. P´erolat
K. Tuyls
R. Munos
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on actor-critic algorithms for multi-agent Markov games, providing a framework for policy optimization in partially observable environments.
dcterms:title: Actor-critic algorithms for multi-agent Markov games

dcterms:creator: J. Perolat
B. Piot
O. Pietquin
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents approximate dynamic programming techniques for two-player zero-sum Markov games, enhancing the understanding of value iteration methods in competitive settings.
dcterms:title: Approximate dynamic programming for two-player zero-sum Markov games

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhu
D. Zhao
dcterms:description: A dataset that introduces online minimax Q network learning for two-player zero-sum Markov games, focusing on the application of deep learning techniques in competitive environments.
dcterms:title: Online minimax Q network learning
